attributes.action: Support the Kurdish Peshmerga with weapons!!
attributes.additional_details:
I have recently filmed with SKY-NEWS doing
 FIGHTING IS BIG PHIL'S WAR! 
He is Ex SAS and he saw first hand what the weapons are like and how the front-line operates.
attributes.background: I have been supporting the Kurd's on the front-line & I think that the British government could do more by arming the Kurd's with the proper equipment to defeat these terrorists. There weapons are very old and some don't work properly or they are bought off the black market at extortionate prices.
